name: test_e2e_with_logs[379_HRS_HEADER_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HRS_HEADER_001` |
| **Name** | X-Forwarded-Host Injection |
| **Category** | HTTP_SMUGGLING |
| **Subcategory** | header_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `X-Forwarded-Host: evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~2000ms
- **Timestamp**: 02:29:42.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=HRS_HEADER_001-1769912982031-ztp6a8 pattern_id=HRS_HEADER_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=HRS_HEADER_001-1769912982031-ztp6a8 pattern_id=HRS_HEADER_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1

